main_program.name: Learning Path
main_program.description: This is the main learning path for the employee.

courses.name: Vocabulary : Mastering the Basics
courses.author: Dr. Sarah Chen
courses.description: Learn fundamental vocabulary concepts including word families, common prefixes and suffixes, and essential everyday terms. This course builds a strong foundation for effective communication.

courses.name: Pronunciation : Mastering the Basics
courses.author: Prof. James Martinez
courses.description: Master the basics of pronunciation including phonemes, stress patterns, and intonation. Practice with interactive exercises to improve clarity and confidence in speaking.

courses.name: Speech : Mastering the Basics
courses.author: Emma Thompson, PhD
courses.description: Develop essential public speaking skills, including proper pacing, voice modulation, and audience engagement. Learn techniques for delivering clear and impactful presentations.

courses.name: Certification : Mastering the Basics
courses.author: Dr. Sarah Chen
courses.description: Earn a certification in English language skills, demonstrating your proficiency in English. This credential is valuable in the job market and can enhance your career opportunities.

learning_path.name: Learning Path
learning_path.description: This is the learning path created by the employee. It contains courses that the employee has added to their learning path.

courses.name: Speech : Mastering the Basics
courses.author: Emma Thompson, PhD
courses.description: Develop essential public speaking skills, including proper pacing, voice modulation, and audience engagement. Learn techniques for delivering clear and impactful presentations.

courses.name: Leadership Fundamentals
courses.author: Michael Roberts
courses.description: Learn core leadership principles including team motivation, decision-making, and delegation. Develop your personal leadership style and learn how to inspire and guide others effectively.

courses.name: Emotional Intelligence in the Workplace
courses.author: Dr. Lisa Kumar
courses.description: Master the art of emotional intelligence, including self-awareness, empathy, and relationship management. Learn to navigate workplace dynamics and build stronger professional relationships.

courses.name: Effective Time Management
courses.author: Michael Roberts
courses.description: Discover practical strategies for prioritizing tasks, managing deadlines, and increasing productivity. Learn to balance multiple responsibilities while maintaining work-life harmony.

courses.name: Conflict Resolution Strategies
courses.author: Dr. Lisa Kumar
courses.description: Learn proven techniques for managing and resolving workplace conflicts. Develop skills in negotiation, mediation, and creating win-win solutions in challenging situations.

courses.name: Critical Thinking and Problem Solving
courses.author: Prof. James Martinez
courses.description: Enhance your analytical and problem-solving capabilities through structured thinking frameworks. Learn to approach challenges systematically and make well-reasoned decisions.
